page.title: 04THE CAT AND DOG HOME
page.content: { { THE CAT AND DOG HOME Just a short distance from the school is Seafield Cat and Dog Home. If a cat or a dog gets lost and the Police find it they take it to the Cat and Dog Home and then it is put into a cage. If the owner does not come for it at a certain time the cat or dog can be sold to someone else.If nobody wants it it will be put down.The Cat and Dog Home is near the links. It is the only one in Edinburgh.People go to the Cat and Dog Home sometimes if they dont want their cat or dog. Some people don't take their pet to the Cat and Dog Home they just let it run wild in the street and eat out of the rubbish bins in the street. { {
